Html:
Hi I am trying to use QuickGraph in Silverlight. Since I am new to development, I may have a stupid question.

When I want to use your library for Silverlight app, do I need to also add reference to any other library? (maybe microsoft.contracts.dll?)

I am getting runtime error: "Could not load file or assembly 'QuickGraph.Silverlight...' or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified."

Thank you in advance for any help.
